description: Live in the prestigious Heritage Woods community, surrounded by greenery and peaceful privacy. This bright 2,217 sqft, 3-level home offers an ideal layout with treed views throughout. Enjoy soaring ceilings, a sunken living room, and an open kitchen with breakfast bar and dining area leading to a sunny balcony, perfect for BBQs and family time. Upstairs has 3 bedrooms including a spacious primary with walk-in closet and spa-like ensuite. The lower level includes a versatile bedroom, full bath, and walkout yard. Walk to top schools, Aspenwood Elem, Eagle Mountain Middle & Heritage Woods Sec, plus parks, playgrounds & trails!
